errors.selectBank: Please select a bank to continue

bankSelection.title: Select Bank
bankSelection.error: Failed to load banks. Please try again.

qr.title: Deposit via QR
qr.bankAppNotSupported: Bank app not supported on this device.
qr.permissionDeniedMessage: Please allow Photos access in Settings to save the QR image.
qr.iosPermissionHelp: Photos access is required to save images. Open Settings to allow access.
qr.qrNotGenerated: QR code could not be generated
qr.qrGenerationMessage: Failed to generate QR code. Please try again.
qr.openBankMessage: Unable to open the selected bank app
qr.storagePermission: Storage permission is required to save the QR code
qr.downloadMessage: QR code has been saved to your gallery

linkBank.title: Link New Bank
linkBank.accountNumberHelper: Enter the account number you want to link for withdrawals

errors.title: Link Bank Failed
errors.general: Failed to link bank account. Please try again.
errors.accountNumberTooShort: Account number must be at least 6 digits
errors.accountNumberInvalid: Account number can only contain numbers
errors.limitReached: You have reached the maximum limit of {{max}} linked banks. Please remove an existing bank to add a new one.

success.title: Bank Linked Successfully
success.message: Your bank account has been linked successfully and can now be used for withdrawals.

instructions.title: Important Information:
instructions.step1: • Make sure the account number belongs to you
instructions.step2: • The account holder name must match your profile
instructions.step3: • This account will be used for withdrawal transactions
